front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Low-Rate Wireless Networks - Amendment for Advanced Encryption Standard (AES)-256 Encryption and Security Extensions
front.abstract: This amendment defines security extensions to IEEE Std 802.15.4 adding AES-256-CCM plus a cipher suite/authentication method registry and a process for inclusion of additional algorithms. The registry defines a capability to align IEEE Std 802.15.4 with the security requirements of higher layer standards.
